Phrase.answer: Commands are: /lastseen, /summary, /rank, /ranks, /info, /nextrank, /pm. Type help_command for more info to the command. Example: help_lastseen
This command is used to see when a driver was last online. Usage: /lastseen <login> - Example: /lastseen scordo
This command shows a list of the top record holders. Usage: /summary - Example: /summary
This command shows information about your rank and driven challenges. Usage: /rank - Example: /rank
This command shows a list of all ranks ordered ascending. Usage: /ranks - Example: /ranks
This command shows information about you. Usage: /info - Example: /info
This command shows information about the next rank. Usage: /nextrank - Example: /nextrank
This command is used to send private messages to another player. Usage: /pm <login> <message> - Example: /pm scordo hello!
